Reviews.Title: do not purchase!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: rov
Reviews.Content: I can't believe what had got delivered to me. Its like someone had return this item and the seller never bothered to open it after receiving the return but instead placed it right back on to the shelf for the next person to purchase. aside from all that packaging was very sloppy and used and last but not least the DVR was broken.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this product.
Reviews.Author: rustin.peterson
Reviews.Content: Be prepared to figure this product out on your own.  The instruction manual appears to have been written by a third grader.I regret buying this item.
